description: Number of solutions to x^4 == 0 (mod n).
comments: Shadow transform of fourth powers A000583. - _Michel Marcus_, Jun 06 2013
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^[3e/4]. - _David W. Wilson_, Aug 01 2001
mathematica: Array[ Function[ n, Count[ Array[ PowerMod[ #, 4, n ]&, n, 0 ], 0 ] ], 100 ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
